attributes.action: Allow university students arriving from red list countries to quarantine at home
attributes.additional_details: International students cannot afford to spend for 10 days quarantining in a hotel in addition to travel costs and university fees.
attributes.background: To exempt international students from hotel quarantine if they enter the UK from a red list country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589699
